description: For many young people, becoming a tech giant is very appealing—but it isn't a magic bullet, writes Greg M. Epstein.
title: Why a Technocracy Fails Young People

description: Across the platform, new users—among them journalists, left-leaning politicians and celebrities—have shared that they’re looking forward to using a space free from advertisements and hate speech.
title: Bluesky Adds 1 Million New Users Since U.S. Election, as People Seek Alternatives to X
